channel.title: My minigame(with custom interfaces nd stuff){showoff}
channel.description:
I made this minigame AND all the interfaces myself. so i tak 100% credits of it. The game: Two players challenge, the interface is opened, players choose configuration, and if they want, stake some money. both the stakes are counted into a total stake, wich the winner wins ;) both players get teleported into either the cave, church or training camp. 10 monsters spawn(players choose wich one), and the player who kills all 10 monsters first wins. (players have diff heighlevels so tey cnt see ech other, nor their monsters) the winner also gets 2 points, loser 1. And with those points they can buy special items from my minigame shop :D
Oh and i 1hit bcuz i wear santa :P
All interface features work perfect, and theres also a snail at the challenging room in lower right corner :P VIDEO: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xf9bVFCCEmc&feature=player_profilepage]YouTube - Killer snail - Fire Blades minigame[/url]

I made this minigame AND all the interfaces myself. so i tak 100% credits of it.
The game:
Two players challenge, the interface is opened, players choose configuration, and if they want, stake some money.
both the stakes are counted into a total stake, wich the winner wins
both players get teleported into either the cave, church or training camp.
10 monsters spawn(players choose wich one), and the player who kills all 10 monsters first wins. (players have diff heighlevels so tey cnt see ech other, nor their monsters)
the winner also gets 2 points, loser 1. And with those points they can buy special items from my minigame shop
